Arithmetic mean is the average of a set of numbers. It is calculated by adding all the numbers in the set and dividing the sum by the number of numbers in the set. For example, if you have a set of numbers 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, the arithmetic mean is (1+2+3+4+5)/5 = 3. The arithmetic mean is also known as the average.
